net.javacoding.jspider.spi
Interface EventFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AllowAllEventFilter, AllowNoneEventFilter, ErrorsOnlyEventFilter, NonErrorsOnlyEventFilter
public interface EventFilter

Interface that will be implemented upon a component in a JSpider module that allows to filter JSpider event coming from the engine.

This can be handy, for instance, if you're writing a module that checks all error conditions on a server. In that case, you would not be interested in the HTTP statuses 2xx, but you would definitely want to receive notifications about 4xx and 5xx states.

$Id: EventFilter.java,v 1.2 2003/04/25 21:29:06 vanrogu Exp $

 boolean filterEvent(JSpiderEvent event)

Method Detail

filterEvent

public boolean filterEvent(JSpiderEvent event)
Method that will filter an events and tells the dispatcher whether we're interested in it or not. Returns true if the event must be dispatched, false if it can be ignored.
Parameters:
event - - the JSpider event to be filtered
Returns:
boolean value telling whether to dispatch the event or not
